## Fairlight CMI Waveform Monitor

This dashboard demonstrates a retro-styled waveform visualizer inspired by the classic Fairlight CMI sampler.

### Features:
- Neon green (#39ff14) monospace styling
- Interactive waveform display
- Retro terminal aesthetic
- Real-time data visualization

### Demo
For a working demonstration, see the `demo.html` file which shows the complete interactive visualization.
